languages.text: "Твой вид живет на искусственных кораблях, питаемых энергией усопших. На твоем месте я бы воздержался от инсинуаций".
"Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."
languages.original_text: "Твой вид живет на искусственных кораблях, питаемых энергией усопших. На твоем месте я бы воздержался от инсинуаций".

traits.locale_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."
"Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."
"Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."
"Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

languages.text: “你的族人生活在悬空的墓地里，而这些墓地由你们的死者的能量驱动。如果我是你，我恐怕不会进行进一步的批判。”
languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

traits.locale_text: “你的族人生活在悬空的墓地里，而这些墓地由你们的死者的能量驱动。如果我是你，我恐怕不会进行进一步的批判。”

languages.text: «Su gente vive en cementerios que flotan gracias a la energía de sus muertos. De estar en su posición, me ahorraría las críticas».
languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

traits.locale_text: «Su gente vive en cementerios que flotan gracias a la energía de sus muertos. De estar en su posición, me ahorraría las críticas».

languages.text: 「かくいうお前たちの血族も、使者のエネルギーで動く浮遊墓地で暮らしているだろう。私がお前なら、これ以上の批判は言わないでおくぞ」
languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

traits.locale_text: 「かくいうお前たちの血族も、使者のエネルギーで動く浮遊墓地で暮らしているだろう。私がお前なら、これ以上の批判は言わないでおくぞ」

languages.text: "Euresgleichen lebt auf schwebenden Friedhöfen, die von der Energie Eurer Toten genährt werden. An Eurer Stelle würde ich mir jede weitere Kritik sparen."
languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

traits.locale_text: "Euresgleichen lebt auf schwebenden Friedhöfen, die von der Energie Eurer Toten genährt werden. An Eurer Stelle würde ich mir jede weitere Kritik sparen.

languages.text: « Vos semblables vivent sur des cimetières flottants alimentés par l'énergie de vos morts. Si j'étais vous, je m'abstiendrais de faire ce genre de critique. »
languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

traits.locale_text: « Vos semblables vivent sur des cimetières flottants alimentés par l'énergie de vos morts. Si j'étais vous, je m'abstiendrais de faire ce genre de critique. »

languages.text: "Ölülerin enerjisiyle beslenen, havada asılı kabristanlarda yaşıyorsunuz. Yerinde olsam böyle eleştiriler yapmadan evvel iki kez düşünürdüm."
languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."

traits.locale_text: "Ölülerin enerjisiyle beslenen, havada asılı mezarlıklarda yaşıyorsunuz. Yerinde olsam böyle eleştiriler yapmadan evvel iki kez düşünürdüm."

languages.original_text: "Your kind live on floating graveyards powered by the energy of your dead. If I were you, I would refrain from making any further critiques."
